CARD_DIMENSION: <:_:979009081325019156> The dimension of the image must be `297 x 465`
OFFICIAL_ART_ALLOWED: <:_:979009081325019156> Only and only official art is allowed. Take opinion if you are unsure
USE_DISCORD_LINK: <:_:979009081325019156> Use only discord link for image. ex cdn.discordapp.com, media.discordapp.net
NOT_PING_STAFF: <:_:979009081325019156> Do not ping staff about your image submission and wait patiently
LINK_TO_SOURCE: <:_:979009081325019156> Provide link to the source of the image for us to check
IMAGES_REJECTED: <:_:979009081325019156> Images being used for gifs or 3ds or events will be rejected
NO_PINGING_STAFF: ⚠️ Do not ping staff about your image submission and wait patiently. Try to read all available resources and check good submissions to learn before pinging anyone.
